itunes:title: Episode 536- Special Guest UFC Announcer Jon Anik
title: Episode 536- Special Guest UFC Announcer Jon Anik
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with UFC announcer Jon Anik live in Las Vegas the day before he is set to announce the Conor McGregor vs Cowboy Cerrone fight with Joe Rogan and discuss the preparation it takes going into a fight like this, why h...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with UFC announcer Jon Anik live in Las Vegas the day before he is set to announce the Conor McGregor vs Cowboy Cerrone fight with Joe Rogan and discuss the preparation it takes going into a fight like this, why he loves chaos and controversy inside the octagon, what the most amount of blood he's gotten on his clothes calling these fights, how he'd love to see female heavyweights duke it out one day, and what it's like knowing someone isn't going to be a superstar no matter how hard they try.
